titles.title: Congratulating Marcel Closset, a French citizen and former member of the French Resistance who was instrumental in saving a United States Army Air Corps pilot during World War II, for receiving the French Legion of Honor.

Congratulating Marcel Closset, a French citizen and former member of the French Resistance who was instrumental in saving a United States Army Air Corps pilot during World War II, for receiving the French Legion of Honor.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: Congratulates Marcel Closset for receiving the French Legion of Honor.
